name: R5-CodeSystem-R4B-CodeSystem
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 CodeSystem into FHIR R4B

element.display: Declares the existence of and describes a code system or code system supplement

target.display: Declares the existence of and describes a code system or code system supplement
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem`

element.display: When the CodeSystem was approved by publisher
If code comparison is case sensitive

target.display: If code comparison is case sensitive
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.caseSensitive` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.caseSensitive`

element.display: If code system defines a compositional grammar

target.display: If code system defines a compositional grammar
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.compositional` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.compositional`

target.display: Concepts in the code system
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept`

target.display: Code that identifies concept
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.code` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.code`

target.display: Child Concepts (is-a/contains/categorizes)
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.concept` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.concept`

target.display: Formal definition
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.definition` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.definition`

target.display: Additional representations for the concept
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.designation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.designation`

element.display: Additional ways how this designation would be used

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.designation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.designation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.designation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.designation.id`

target.display: Human language of the designation
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.designation.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.designation.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.designation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.designation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

target.comment: R5 `CodeSystem.concept.designation.use` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CodeSystem.concept.designation.use`
